short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Combine the same numbered blocks together as you attempt to fill the board with 2048 blocks.
short.de: Kombiniere gleich nummerierte Blöcke, um das Spielfeld mit 2048-Blöcken zu füllen.
short.es: Combina los bloques con el mismo número mientras intentas llenar el tablero con bloques de 2048.
short.fr: Combinez les blocs portant le même numéro pour tenter de remplir le plateau avec des blocs de 2048.
short.it: Combina i blocchi con lo stesso numero mentre cerchi di riempire la griglia con blocchi 2048.
short.ja: 同じ番号のブロックを組み合わせて、ボードを 2048 ブロックで埋めよう。
short.ru: Объединяйте блоки с одинаковыми номерами, заполняя поле блоками 2048.
short.tr: Aynı numaralı blokları birleştirerek tahtayı 2048 bloklarıyla doldurmaya çalışın.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Combine blocks with the same numbers to fill the board with 2048 blocks. The more blocks you merge, the higher your final score will be. Keep dropping blocks onto the board until you run out of moves—then it's game over. Create combo moves to unlock extra actions that can help you progress. A strategic puzzle game that challenges your thinking and planning skills!

How to Play:
Tap or click and drag to place blocks on the board.

2048 Plus is an online puzzle game carefully selected for Lagged.com. It's one of our favorite mobile puzzle games to play. Simply click the big play button to jump right in and start having fun. If you’re looking for more games like this, check out Connect Hexas or Hexa Merge!
